channel.title: Please please help i need it so bad ive ben looking for 3 weeks!
channel.description: i need help fixing my costom crossbow and bow they act like meley wepons right now and i need them to fire bolts or arrows please help and tell me what i need to do ty.

item.title: Please please help i need it so bad ive ben looking for 3 weeks!
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“fallen_angel666, post:3, topic:343858”]if you want a very easy way, make the custom c’bow replace another c’bow; In other words, try to replace it with something like a pheonix crossbow, or something you don’t already use in your server.

for the bow, do the same thing but with a shortbow or another bow you don’t use in your server.[/quote]

what ol ca you just tell me what to do?? i inserted a zamorac bow and a bandos cbow

Read full topic
item.source: Please please help i need it so bad ive ben looking for 3 weeks!

item.title: Please please help i need it so bad ive ben looking for 3 weeks!
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

if you want a very easy way, make the custom c’bow replace another c’bow; In other words, try to replace it with something like a pheonix crossbow, or something you don’t already use in your server.

for the bow, do the same thing but with a shortbow or another bow you don’t use in your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Please please help i need it so bad ive ben looking for 3 weeks!

item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Declare them as bows.
Make them use bolts/arrows (ammo)
Add the bow/crossbow animation & emote + arrow/bolt gfx[/quote]

i have no idea what to do 0.0 please help me i did not understand i just started makig servers so can u tell me step by stem on what to do???
